channel.title: [C4D] Bedroom Interior [W.I.P]
channel.description:
Mmkai. Haven't really posted anything here for a while. Mainly because I've been pretty busy. Haven't done much, if anything, with C4D since my last thread. So anyhoo, decided to start a bedroom interior. I'll probably spend a week or two on this getting the textures right...(Most of them are bitches to make/find).
[b](STH - If by luck you happen to read this thread, please contact me - beyond_mexico@hotmail.co.uk :)[/b]
In your C&C please be as brutal as you can. I don't give two shits how much you slag me off and say how shit I am, I need to make it better + realistic. Also, if you can, throw in a suggestion for me ;)
It's best to start off a bedroom with a bed: I need to find a much better wood texture. This one looks a bit eurgh. [img]http://xs217.xs.to/xs217/07282/Bed.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:21, topic:121790”][quote author=soalreaver link=topic=171401.msg1589825#msg1589825 date=1184262156]
mr.chris, i got a question did u make this ??

http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/6327/firstmi0.jpg

i found it on a random C4D website while trying to learn how to use it lol, ( hehe his first i think )

if no… SUM 1 STOLE YOUR NAMZER!!!
[/quote]
I bet Mr.Chris doesn’t know how to make it, so he didn’t make it.[/quote]

^.^ Its Vozzz’s Stoned Smiley! How can you not know ;)?

Its a 30 minute video tutorial on how to make that smiley with lighting and materials…

http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/23716093/?qo=4&q=Stoned+Smiley&qh=boost%3Apopular+age_sigma%3A24h+age_scale%3A5
http://www.deviantart.com/download/23716093/Vozzz__s_Stoned_Smiley_tutorial.zip

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Bedroom Interior [W.I.P]
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:16, topic:121790”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=171401.msg1585013#msg1585013 date=1184118958]

Omg… I just figured out how to make a lamp by looking at yours!

And those textures are really ugly :(…

I know Textures are soo mean sometimes.

Just incase -
F4>Linear Spline>Straight diagonal line>Lathe Nurb

Easy as.

I’ll sort out the matress with a plane>clothide tag to give it that ‘beddy’ look
[/quote]

Or just make a cone and delete the top and bottom :|…[/quote]

I suppose you could do that, but using splines is always the best way to go about most things with an irregular shape.

Read full topic

So anyhoo, decided to start a bedroom interior. I’ll probably spend a week or two on this getting the textures right…(Most of them are bitches to make/find).
